name: Chopped mannequin (LDjam 45)
description:
You have no arms and legs, but that does not stop you from enjoying life. Collect all your body parts and we will consider that the game is over.

Honestly, I had a completely different concept for this game, but due to the fact that I do not know how to do procedural animation, there was absolutely no time to understand. That turned out what happened.
